alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 8:58AM AKST until February 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONTAL PASSAGE WEDNESDAY... .Many locations are starting to mix with and will changeover to rain throughout the day. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to around an inch. Storm total accumulation of 4 to 7 inches expected. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest accumulations expected along the Chilkat Peninsula and near White Pass. Some mixing with rain is possible near sea level Wednesday afternoon. Snow may continue beyond the advisory timeframe for White Pass, but at a reduced rate.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
